@Hakuna Matata: Agreed! This torrent would be a lot healthier if it had been properly labelled and indexed. If you search "Fringe S03" then you get all the results: Fringe S03E01, Fringe S03E02, etc., but if you search Fringe Season 3 then it narrows your results better. If it had just been given keywords, it would have been better. Or a description. Or an IMDB link!
@twentyforty: Great torrent, and many thanks, but 20 seconds, and a little thought, would have made all the difference to our download speeds.
Having said which, there are at least two people trying to give me over 800K, so it's not hanging around! Great seeding guys!

Having said which, I had two seeds trying to give me over 800K each, so it didn't hang about!

And the quality is excellent!
